content: slip_stitch to join work even for desired number of rounds if any before waist shaping to work even repeat rounds 11 and 12 begin waist shaping see partial stitch diagram next page round 15 chain 3 3cl counts as initial 4cl * treble_crochet chain 1 twice v chain 1 treble_crochet twice 7cl repeat from * around work 3cl in last 3 st slip_stitch to join round 16 slip_stitch to first treble_crochet chain 3 and double_crochet in next 9 st *skcl double_crochet 9 repeat from * around ending skip last st slip_stitch to chain 3 round 17 chain 3 2cl counts as initial 3cl * treble_crochet chain 1 twice v chain 1 treble_crochet twice 5cl repeat from * around ending 2cl in last 2 st slip_stitch to join rounds 18-22 work last two rounds twice more then work round 16 once more or until desired length before starting hip shaping waist shaping stitch diagram begin hip shaping see partial stitch diagram next page round 23 chain 3 2cl counts as initial 3cl *chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 twice v chain 1 treble_crochet twice chain 1 5cl repeat from * around ending 2cl in last 2 st slip_stitch to join round 24 slip_stitch to first chain space chain 3 and double_crochet in next 11 st *skcl double_crochet 11 repeat from * around to ending skip last st slip_stitch to chain 3 round 25 chain 3 3cl counts as initial 4cl *chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 twice v chain 1 treble_crochet twice chain 1 7cl repeat from * around ending 3cl in last 3 st slip_stitch to join round 26 repeat round 24 round 27 chain 3 2cl counts as initial 3cl * treble_crochet chain 1 three times v chain 1 treble_crochet three times 5cl repeat from * around ending 2cl in last 2 st slip_stitch to join round 28 slip_stitch to first chain space chain 3 and double_crochet in next 13 st *skcl double_crochet 13 repeat from * around to last 2 st double_crochet skip last st slip_stitch to chain 3 counts as skcl round 29 chain 3 3cl counts as initial 4cl * treble_crochet chain 1 three times v chain 1 treble_crochet three times 7cl repeat from * around ending 3cl in last 3 st slip_stitch to join round 30 repeat round 28 round 31 chain 3 3cl counts as initial 4cl *chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 three times v chain 1 treble_crochet three times chain 1 7cl repeat from * around ending 3cl in last 3 st slip_stitch to join round 32 slip_stitch to first chain space chain 3 and double_crochet in next 15 st *skcl double_crochet 15 repeat from * around to last 2 st double_crochet skip last st slip_stitch to chain 3 counts as skcl to extend length of top repeat the following two rounds until top is desired length round 33 chain 3 4cl counts as initial 5cl *chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 three times v chain 1 treble_crochet three times chain 1 9cl repeat from *
